sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè dòng jiù lóu jiāng bèi chāichú.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce vieux bâtiment sera démoli.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This old building will be demolished.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 物理是我最喜欢的科目。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wùlǐ shì wǒ zuì xǐhuan de kēmù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La physique est ma matière préférée.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Physics is my favorite subject.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhōngguó de báijiǔ dùshù hěn gāo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'alcool blanc chinois a un degré d'alcool très élevé.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Chinese baijiu has a very high alcohol content.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Hūnlǐ de chǎngmiàn fēicháng shèngdà.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La scène du mariage était très grandiose.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The wedding scene was very grand.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā jìchéng le fùqīn de shìyè.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a hérité de l'entreprise de son père.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He inherited his father's business.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这座城市发生了巨大的变化。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè zuò chéngshì fāshēng le jùdà de biànhuà.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette ville a connu d'énormes changements.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This city has undergone huge changes.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 公司面临着很大的挑战。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Gōngsī miànlínzhe hěn dà de tiǎozhàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'entreprise fait face à de grands défis.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The company is facing great challenges.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè jiā diàn de shāngpǐn hěn qíquán.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce magasin a une gamme complète de produits.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This store has a complete range of products.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā zài yī jiā yínháng shíxí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il fait un stage dans une banque.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is interning at a bank.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Bùyào kànbuqǐ rènhé rén.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ne méprise personne.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Don't look down on anyone.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xíngdòng bǐ yányǔ gèng zhòngyào.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les actions sont plus importantes que les paroles.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Actions are more important than words.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我把你看成最好的朋友。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ bǎ nǐ kànchéng zuì hǎo de péngyou.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je te considère comme mon meilleur ami.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I regard you as my best friend.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 青年是一个重要的群体。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qīngnián shì yī gè zhòngyào de qúntǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les jeunes constituent un groupe important.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Young people are an important group.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shīqù le gōngzuò.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a perdu son travail.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He lost his job.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā chuānzhe yī tào hēisè xīzhuāng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il porte un costume noir.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is wearing a black suit.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zuìjìn wùjià shàngzhǎng le hěn duō.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les prix ont beaucoup augmenté récemment.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Prices have risen a lot recently.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 你能从中学到很多东西。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ néng cóngzhōng xuédào hěn duō dōngxi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Tu peux en apprendre beaucoup.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: You can learn a lot from it.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shì wǒmen xuéxí de mófàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle est un modèle pour nous.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She is a role model for us.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Dàjiā yīqǐ hǎn kǒuhào.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Tout le monde crie des slogans ensemble.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Everyone shouts slogans together.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这个工具是用来切菜的。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège gōngjù shì yòng lái qiē cài de.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cet outil est utilisé pour couper les légumes.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This tool is used for cutting vegetables.
